title: Recfree - Download music or video from Youtube or any streaming
description:
Download any streaming content from the web with our amazing plug-in device.
One click and your favorite media can be saved to your desktop. 

It's Cool & Free 

RecFree is the fastest recording device available, with no spyware or any other trojans.

RecFree will appear as a toolbar in your browser. You are now ready to download and convert streaming media to an MP3 file.

Ready to download?
Choose your favorite song on Media website (such as youtube or myspace..) and press the play button on the player.

Now click the "Click to Download" button on the Recfree toolbar. 
The download will start in a new window,
Let your computer download the MP3 file and wait until the process of downloading and converting finishes.

That's it! Once the download has completed, click the "Open" button and you will see your song in the "Saved Songs" folder.

Keep downloading and have fun!
